title: An Apple Store Worker Is the New Face of US Labor Law Reform
description: The company's anti-union tactics at retail outlets have drawn government scrutiny and are fueling a drive to get a new labor bill through Congress.

title: Uber and Lyft Are More Likely to Fire Drivers of Color
description: After passenger complaints, non-white drivers are suspended or deactivated more often than their white counterparts, according to new research.

title: India’s YouTube Vigilante Is Wanted for Murder
description: Monu Manesar built a huge audience with violent content, but he’s far from the only sectarian streamer in Modi’s India.

title: Face Recognition Software Led to His Arrest. It Was Dead Wrong
description: Alonzo Sawyer’s misidentification by algorithm made him a suspect for a crime police now say was committed by someone else—feeding debate over regulation.
